thread.section_title: Things Engraved Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Things Engraved Inc. | thingsengraved.ca
thread.title: Syvenky
thread.title_full: Things Engraved Inc. reviewed by Syvenky

author: Syvenky
title: Syvenky
text: Ordering was easy, and then I found out I had made a mistake in my order (wrong spelling of name). I emailed them later that day (on a Friday). on Monday, I received an email reply with confirmation of my requested changes and everything was delivered on time. I'd order from them again in a heartbeat!
